p: Acute oral toxicity effects of the aqueous and methanolic stem bark extracts of P. thonningii were also investigated in this study. The results demonstrated no observable signs of toxicity and lethal effects in experimental groups of mice even at the limit/cut-off dose of 2000 mg/kg bw. The LD 50 values for each of the studied plant extracts were thus envisaged to be above 2000 mg/kg bw.
